location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 3/28 Sale of naval dhows and motor craft'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged chronologically from the front to the rear of the file.
Foliation: The foliation system in use is the sequence of numbers appearing in the top right hand corner of each page.

mods.abstract: Correspondence concerning the sale of naval dhows in the Royal Naval Base, Jufair. Descriptions of the naval dhows are listed with their dimensions and description of their hull and engine. Correspondents include Mr Cornelius James Pelly, Political Agent, Bahrain; Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Bahrain Government; Senior Naval Officer Persian Gulf.
